tools.name: Digital Multimeter
tools.description: A compact digital multimeter for measuring voltage, current, and resistance, designed for use in tight spaces.

tools.name: Clamp Meter
tools.description: Measures current, voltage, and resistance with clamp-on functionality for easy current measurement.

tools.name: Voltage Tester
tools.description: A non-contact voltage tester that quickly checks for the presence of voltage in wires and outlets.

tools.name: Wire Strippers
tools.description: Manual wire strippers for cutting and stripping insulation from wires of various gauges.

tools.name: Screwdriver Set
tools.description: A set of insulated screwdrivers designed for electrical work, including flathead and Phillips head drivers.

tools.name: Cable Crimping Tool
tools.description: Crimps connectors onto wires to create secure electrical connections.

tools.name: Electrical Tape
tools.description: Insulating tape for electrical wiring to provide insulation and protect against electrical shock.

tools.name: Megger
tools.description: A comprehensive insulation tester for measuring insulation resistance and conducting high voltage testing.

tools.name: Soldering Iron Kit
tools.description: Includes a soldering iron, stand, and solder to make electrical connections and repairs.

tools.name: Electrical Pliers
tools.description: Pliers designed for gripping, twisting, and cutting wires with precision.

tools.name: Welding Machine
tools.description: A versatile MIG welding machine ideal for various welding applications including steel, aluminum, and stainless steel.

tools.name: Adjustable Spanner
tools.description: An adjustable spanner for gripping various sizes of nuts and bolts with precision.

tools.name: Cordless Hand Drill
tools.description: A powerful cordless hand drill with two speed settings and a 20V battery, suitable for drilling and driving tasks.

tools.name: Grinder
tools.description: A high-performance angle grinder designed for cutting, grinding, and polishing various materials.
